statements: DELETE FROM FinancialRecords WHERE id = 100 AND revenue > 5000;
DELETE FROM FinancialRecords WHERE date < '2021-01-01' AND waste_to_energy_category = 'Recycling';
DELETE FROM revenue_records WHERE amount > 1000 AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM expense_records WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND amount <= 500;
DELETE FROM FinancialRecords WHERE type = 'Income' AND amount < 0;
DELETE FROM FinancialRecords WHERE amount > 10000 AND record_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Revenue WHERE date = '2021-12-31' OR amount < 5000;
DELETE FROM WasteToEnergyPlant WHERE location = 'New York';
